subtitle: There are two fundamental forces working within us all the time.
One is our instinct of survival.
You want to survive.
We can take survival to different levels but essentially the instinct of survival this
one wants to.
This limited entity wants to survive and do well.
This instinct is there in all of us.
It’s there in every creature in the world.
Another dimension is there is something within you that always wants to expand.
When you are in a survival mode you want to build walls around yourself.
Boundaries are important.
If you let your dog lose on the street you will see he goes all around peeing all over
the place.
Not because he has some urinary problem.
He is building his pee kingdom.
He’s setting his boundaries.
It’s a natural instinct.
He is trying to set his own boundaries all the time.
This is a survival instinct in all of us.
That we want to build a wall.
To protect us.
Self preservation.
But there’s another dimension that wants to expand.
If you don’t empower that..if you only empower your instinct of survival then you will build
a wall of self preservation.
And after some time you realize, walls of self preservation are walls of imprisonment
after some time.
Yes?
If you build a wall today, today you see an enemy outside and you build a wall, tomorrow
you are in your own prison.
Somebody else put you in prison that’s bad, but you yourself put you in prison, that’s
horror.
Yes?
So the instinct of self preservation has to be consciously balanced.
Otherwise we’ll end up building walls and walls.
So inevitably when we feel unsafe, we build a wall.
So the instinct of self preservation cannot be ignored.
It is there.
Obviously.
Isn’t it?
Obviously it is there in all of us.
Walls are not always of brick and mortar, there are a variety of walls we set up.
But the longing to expand is also there.
How much expansion do you want if you sincerely look at this today if you’re here you want
to be a little bigger, if you’re there you want to be a little bigger.
But suppose I make you the queen of this planet.
Hello.
Don’t look at me hopefully.
Laughing.
Ah such a blunder.
Suppose I make you the queen of this planet.
Will you be fulfilled?
No..you will look at the moon.
“Why not that?”
If I give you the moon will you keep quiet?
You will look at the next galaxy.
If I give you one galaxy will you keep quiet?
You will look at other galaxies.
So there is something within you which wants to expand.
How much expansion is inside of you if you think about it, you want to expand boundlessly.
There is something within you that does not like boundaries, please look at this.
If I imprison you right now in a 5 by 5 cubical you will feel horrible.
So tomorrow we will announce your liberation and put you into a 10 by 10 cubicle.
No, you will feel wonderful.
For a day.
And then you will feel horrible in the 10 by 10 cubicle.
We will liberate you into a 100 by 100 cubicle.
You will feel really great for 3 days.
Again you will feel the same thing.
It doesn’t matter where I set the boundary.
The moment you can feel the boundary you want to break it.
So there is something within you that does not like boundaries.
So there is something which does not like boundaries, it simply means it is longing
to become boundless.
You cannot become boundless through physical means.
Physicality means, the fundamentals of physicality is a defined boundary.
Without a defined boundary there is no physical body.
Suppose there were no boundaries to my body, where would I be?
Here or there or where?
Only because this has a boundary it is here.
Your body has a boundary so It is there.
But there is something within us that longs to be boundless.
If we do not empower this, there will be no balance between masculine and feminine.
That is why ultimate liberation both for men and women, one cannot be liberated from the
other, they have to be liberated from what? from this bondage of being stuck in our own
bodies.And identify with little bodily changes we have in us and go on endlessly about the
same debate.
No. unless we become free of our own identification of our physical form there is really no freedom.
This is what consciousness means.
And intelligence that creates this body.
We need to identify with something bigger than our body and our brains.
Everybody must have at least a drop.
A drop of something which is beyond your body.
Which is beyond your mind.
Something within you which is not a concoction of your mind.
A place to stand which is beyond psychological and physiological processes.
Must be there in every life.
As a part of this we launched what is called which is being practiced by many people has
any one every heard an Isha Kriya?
People can’t keep their mind aside.

if you sit here, your body will be here, your mind will be there.
What is you will be little away from that.
Once there is little distance between you and your body, between you and your mind.
This is the end of suffering.
Because human suffering happens only on 2 different levels, physiological suffering
and psychological suffering.
Do you know any other kind of suffering?
Hello?
Physical suffering, mental suffering, this is all!
Once there is distance between you and your body between you and your mind, this is the
end of suffering.
This must not happen to you at the end of your life but at the beginning of your life.
Because the fear of suffering is what has crippled humanity.
A human being has not explored the full depth and dimension of who they are simply because
of the fear of suffering.
What will happen to me?
What will happen to me?
Is always the concern.
Isn’t it?
Suppose you came to this kind of ease.
Whatever the hell happened to me, this is how I will be.
If this assurance and ease came into your life, then you would explore life in many
more ways than you’re doing it right now.
Isn’t it so?
This needs to happen.
If we want to unleash human genius on this planet, the fear of suffering has to go.
For that to go you must know something beyond your physiological and psychological structures.
